shaTra:
Shades have a much lower chance to perform ghost events, For every 1% of average sanity lost, ghost event chance is increased by 2% (starting with 0% change at 100% sanity). A Shade can't start a hunt with multiple people nearby. 

The Shade prefers to do the airball event. **(p.airball)**, also it prefers to be in the shadow form during ghost events. 

Can Hunt at 35% Sanity.
shaAbi: The Shade has no hidden abilities.
